turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, can you order my my usual drink at Starbucks, the Cinnamon Dolce Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely, what location are you closest to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks in Kroger off Navarre Avenue

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I can do that now. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A grande please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I have that down, any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk please, and make sure there is no whip cream just the sprinkles.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so a Grande Cinnamon Dolce Latte, Almond Milk, No Whip, just cinnamon sprinkles?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! That is correct, I appreciate it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I placed an order for your latte at the Starbucks in Kroger on Navarre Avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You said no whip cream right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I made sure no whip cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your'e welcome!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did they give an ETA?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes they did, it will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome you are the best!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know! And your receipt should be sent to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I see it, thanks again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem!
